name: Janitor Joe: Earth Defender
description:
join the battle of a janitor on a mission to save the earth from alien invasion. use the ultimate blaster to eliminate all alien. there only 1 catch, this weapon will automatically change it bullet type every 10 second. use it well and you will be able to survive trought any alien attack.

this game was created for the GMTK gamejam 2020.

Control :

  • Mouse : Aim / Movement
  • Left Click : Move player toward mouse
  • Enter : Continue Dialogue
